title: Connect Four
description: A simple connect four game made in Python using Pygame.

title: snoke (snake)
description: A snake copy made in Python using Pygame. You could play and retry, it also collected some stats about your runs.

title: floppy bird (Flappy Bird)
description: A copy of the famous Flappy Bird game made in Python using Pygame. This one also had stats about your runs. And this time it also had some particles.

title: Ping Pong (With AI)
description: A simple ping pong game made with Pygame aswell, you played against a simple AI that predicted the ball movement.

title: Totris (Tetris)
description: Was suppose to be a working tetris game, but I never figured out how to rotate the blocks.

title: Ball Bouncer
description: My most elaborate game yet. Balls bouncing around and you the player avoid them. Your time alive was your score.

title: MineSwooper (MineSweeper)
description: My most polished game yet. Working MineSweeper with customizable board size and mine amount. And in my opinion a very polished design.

title: Social Media App
description: Was the last school project we had for web server development. It was like twitter where you would post your "Thoughts". You could like, follow, comment etc

title: Airport Simulation
description: A simulation of planes taking off and landing. Following their route across multiple airports. It was visualized via dots and squares. And you could click on a airplane to get some stats about that plane.

title: IMDb Stats
description: You could upload your IMDb ratings and the website would give you a breakdown of your ratings.

title: Critic Party
description: Was suppose to be a collaborative watchlist app where you would create a watchlist, and have it integrate with discord so you could vote on what to watch, set timeline for what we are watching and vote for movies, skip movies etc.

title: Toolie
description: A subtle app made for schools, where you could create classes, randomize groups, create notes, timers, etc.

title: Karriarkurvan.se
description: A website advertising their job fair, made with Svelte. Allowed me to work closely with my team and another company to learn how it is to work with professionals.

title: RKS.se
description: A website for a non-profit association, made using Wordpress. Allowed me to learn how to use Kanban and agile development. Also allowed me to build my people skills.
